Parameters: float: A non-negative number representing the maximum deviation of the playback rate from the playback rate set. (abs(actual_rate - set_rate) / set_rate)
Throws: if the tolerance is negative, or not less than one.
setTolerance(float).Description: Sets the tolerance. The default tolerance is platform specific, but is never more than 1/24.

allowDefaults().Description: Allows defaults to be returned for properties not set. Otherwise a @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ exception is raised when getting those properties which have defaults but have never been set.

Returns: audio adjust mode Value is @B_android#media#SyncParams#AUDIO_ADJUST_MODE_DEFAULT_E@, @B_android#media#SyncParams#AUDIO_ADJUST_MODE_STRETCH_E@, or @B_android#media#SyncParams#AUDIO_ADJUST_MODE_RESAMPLE_E@
Throws: if the audio adjust mode is not set.

Parameters: float: A non-negative number used as an initial hint on the video frame rate to be used when using vsync as the sync source. A negative number is used to clear a previous hint.
setFrameRate(float).Description: Sets the video frame rate hint to be used. By default the frame rate is unspecified.

Returns: tolerance factor. A non-negative number representing the maximum deviation of the playback rate from the playback rate set. (abs(actual_rate - set_rate) / set_rate)

Throws: if the sync source is not set.

Returns: frame rate factor. A non-negative number representing the maximum deviation of the playback rate from the playback rate set. (abs(actual_rate - set_rate) / set_rate), or a negative number representing the desire to clear a previous hint using these params.
Throws: if frame rate is not set.
getFrameRate().Description: Retrieves the video frame rate hint.

ClassDesc: Structure for common A/V sync params. Used by @B_android#media#MediaSync_E@ {link MediaSync#getSyncParams()} and {link MediaSync#setSyncParams(SyncParams)} to control A/V sync behavior. @B_android#media#SyncParams#AUDIO_ADJUST_MODE_DEFAULT_E@: System will determine best handling. @B_android#media#SyncParams#AUDIO_ADJUST_MODE_STRETCH_E@: Change the speed of audio playback without altering its pitch. @B_android#media#SyncParams#AUDIO_ADJUST_MODE_RESAMPLE_E@: Change the speed of audio playback by resampling the audio. @B_android#media#SyncParams#SYNC_SOURCE_DEFAULT_E@: System will determine best selection. @B_android#media#SyncParams#SYNC_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CLOCK_E@: Use system clock for sync source. @B_android#media#SyncParams#SYNC_SOURCE_AUDIO_E@: Use audio track for sync source. @B_android#media#SyncParams#SYNC_SOURCE_VSYNC_E@: Syncronize media to vsync.
